=xStream=
||<img align="center" width=150 height=150 src="http://xbmc-development-with-passion.googlecode.com/svn/branches/repo/plugin.video.xstream/icon.png">||xStream is a video addon for different websites. Most of them are german and list movie and tvshow streams.<br>Please try it out and give me some feedback.||

<br>
==List of supported sites==
  * anime-proxer.me
  * anime-stream24.com
  * burningseries.org
  * gstream.in
  * iload.to
  * kino.de
  * kinokiste.com
  * kinox.to
  * movie2k.to
  * moviemaze.de
  * mtv.de
  * serienjunkies.org
  * simpsons.to
  * ustream.tv


<br>
==List of supported streams==
  * divxstage
  * ecostream
  * megavideo
  * movshare
  * novamov
  * putlocker
  * rapidvideo
  * rutube
  * sharefiles
  * skyload
  * sockshare
  * stage666
  * stream2k
  * uploadc
  * ustream
  * videobb
  * vidbux
  * videoweed
  * videozer
  * vidxden
  * xvidstage
  * zshare

Some divx hosters cannot be played due to codec problems (look into log file). This seams to be rather a Windows- than a Linux problem.
